com.ea.orbit.actors.cluster

Interface IClusterPeer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClusterPeer

    public interface IClusterPeer
    Represents a node connection to a cluster of orbit actor nodes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <K,V> ConcurrentMap<K,V> getCache(String name)
      Gets a reference to a distributed cache
      Task<?> join(String clusterName)
      Joins a cluster
      void leave()
      Leaves the cluster.
      INodeAddress localAddress()
      Gets the cluster address of the local node represented by this peer.
      void registerMessageReceiver(MessageListener messageListener)
      Registers a listener that will be called every time a cluster message is received.
      void registerViewListener(ViewListener viewListener)
      Registers a callback that will be invoked every time the set of cluster nodes changed.
      void sendMessage(INodeAddress toAddress, byte[] message)
      Sends a message to other cluster node.

    • Method Detail

      • localAddress

        INodeAddress localAddress()
        Gets the cluster address of the local node represented by this peer. Only available after joining.

      • registerViewListener

        void registerViewListener(ViewListener viewListener)
        Registers a callback that will be invoked every time the set of cluster nodes changed. The first time it is called is after joining.
        Parameters:
        viewListener - the listener

      • registerMessageReceiver

        void registerMessageReceiver(MessageListener messageListener)
        Registers a listener that will be called every time a cluster message is received.
        Parameters:
        messageListener - the listener

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(INodeAddress toAddress,
                 byte[] message)
        Sends a message to other cluster node.
        Parameters:
        toAddress - the target node address
        message - the byte array representing the message

      • getCache

        <K,V> ConcurrentMap<K,V> getCache(String name)
        Gets a reference to a distributed cache
        Type Parameters:
        K - the cache key
        V - the cache value
        Parameters:
        name - cache name
        Returns:
        a cache

      • join

        Task<?> join(String clusterName)
        Joins a cluster
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the name/identifier of the cluster
        Returns:
        future representing the completion of the joining process.

      • leave

        void leave()
        Leaves the cluster.
